channel.title: Need Hoster and Shop Coder
channel.description:
Hello,
[ul][li]I am currently working on PK Tribe: [url=http://www.pktribe.smfforfree3.com]www.pktribe.smfforfree3.com[/url][/li] [li]The release date will be in 1 week:[url=http://www.bleacheatingfreaks.com/makeacountdown/?id=288540]http://www.bleacheatingfreaks.com/makeacountdown/?id=288540[/url][/li][/ul]
Sadly I will be gone for 1 week, so as soon as i get back its time to release. I need a good shop coder and I need a dedicated no-ip hoster who can host up to 30 people with no lagg. If you can fill either 1 of these spots please apply below. If you apply you get a free tour of the server.
Thank you, Rich Dude
[u]Application.[/u] [code][b]Position Wanted:[/b]________________ [b]Do you have experience:[/b]________________ [i]Proff:[/][url]________________[/url] [b]Will you use the forums:[/b]________________ [b]Can you use email, or msn[/b]________________ (My msn: erbeeler@hotmail.com) [b]Are you trustworthy:[/b]________________[/code]
[u]Only add below to your application if you are applying for hoster:[/u] [code][b]What is the limit of people you can hold without lagg:[/b]________________[/code]
[u]Only add below to your application if you are applying for coder:[/u] [code][b]Can you code other things than just shops:[/b]________________ [b]I have a problem with my trade in my server, could you fix it:[/b]________________[/code][br][size=1]Posted on: June 02, 2007, 12:31:04 PM[/size][hr]hoster, might be full depends if my hoster will take job!

item.title: Need Hoster and Shop Coder
